instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3588-A not turn on
threads.message:
this imac not turn on, only 1 led  light before press power and after also
I already tried with another power supply in good condition, problem persists
the power button is in good condition
when pressing power  the 1 led blinks once

This logic board I don't know what measures to take, thank you

threads.title: 820-3588-A not turn on
threads.message:
Check for drop pulse at 12V_S5_FET.
You may need to change Q6970.

threads.title: 820-3588-A not turn on
threads.message:
You've said to note LED0301 pulsing, when press power button.
Do you note drop pulse at 12V_S5_FET at same moment???

threads.title: 820-3588-A not turn on
threads.message:
12V_S5_FET;it goes down to 11.3v and goes back to 12. 11 when I press power
The led turns off for an instant when value from 12V_S5_FET12.11  to 11 and it is at the same moment
